name: Pencil Heart
description:
This is platformer, in which you play as a pencil who sacrifices himself to draw his way to love.

Team Name: SteppeHareStudio 
Each Team Member's Name and Email Address: Dmitriy Mozokhin (dmitrii-mozohin@bk.ru), Zarif Kurochkin (zarif-k@yandex.ru), Rinat Kurochkin (steppeharestudio@gmail.com) 

Game Name: PencilHeart 
Name of your submission: SteppeHareStudio_PencilHeart 
A link to gameplay footage  

All meshes and effects were made during the Game Jam.

All animations are from Mixamo.

All sounds from the game were created before GameJam. Many of them were changed. Sources: freesound.org, "Prosound collection" Unreal asset, Hollywood sound collection. 

Music were created before the game submission by other authors. Compositions "Hot swing" were created by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com) 
License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).

Whole game was made during the stream on a twitch channel https://www.twitch.tv/steppe_hare_channel
